channel.title: Projects on Ali Saidi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ali Saidi

item.title: Project 2: ChatBot Tunisien
item.description: 1-pipeline: •tokenize lines (split lines into words in the same list) •eliminate duplicated words and word have same sense with lemmatizer •Preparing data by transforming words in the list into numerical values, create the bag of words (exemple : Our list after tokenize ->[hi, bye, I, will, go, eat, play, too, football, see, u, watch, champions, league] ->length=13 Line 1-> hi, I will go to eat [1,0,1,1,1,0,1,0,0,0,0,0,0]->same length: refer to eat tag

item.title: Project 1: Sales Insights India Hardware Company AtliQ
item.description: •Data Analysis Using SQL •Data Cleaning & ETL(extract transform load ) Using Power BI based on DAX language •identify important features that influence the profit and revenue (KPI) •Build Dashboard Or a Report •Publish A Report •dashboard in mobile application(responsive) •give a feedback (report) to the manager to make decisions Link To GitHub Repository
